info.name: Effortless-Respond API v3.0
info.description:
Complete API collection for Effortless-Respond - AI-driven questionnaire processing with semantic search using OpenAI embeddings.

## Features
- Batch questionnaire processing
- 4-step intelligent matching logic
- Auto-linking with confidence levels
- MySQL database with JSON vector storage

## Base URL
http://localhost:8000

## Documentation
Swagger UI: http://localhost:8000/docs

request.description: Returns API version, features, and basic information.

url.raw: {{base_url}}/create-response?question_id=ISO27001-001&question_text=What is ISO 27001 certification?&answer_text=ISO 27001 is an international standard for information security management systems (ISMS). It provides a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information, ensuring it remains secure through people, processes, and IT systems.&evidence=ISO/IEC 27001:2013

query.description: Unique identifier for the canonical question

query.value: ISO 27001 is an international standard for information security management systems (ISMS). It provides a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information, ensuring it remains secure through people, processes, and IT systems.

request.description: Create a new canonical response with AI-generated embedding. The embedding is automatically generated from the question text using OpenAI's text-embedding-3-small model (1024 dimensions).
Get all canonical responses stored in the database (for debugging/admin purposes).
Delete a canonical response by ID (admin only).
Get all saved question links (mappings from new questions to canonical responses).
Delete a saved question link by ID.

Process a questionnaire using the 4-step logic:
1. Check saved links
2. Check exact matches
3. AI semantic search
4. Confidence-based classification (LINKED/CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED/NO_MATCH)

**Production-ready optimized batch processing endpoint**

Features:
- Automatic chunking for batches > 2048 questions
- Exponential backoff retry logic (3 retries: 2s, 4s, 8s)
- Single API call per chunk (vs N individual calls)
- Handles unlimited questions

Performance:
- 500 questions: 1 API call instead of 500 (500x faster)
- 1000 questions: 1 API call instead of 1000 (1000x faster)
- 10000 questions: 5 API calls instead of 10000 (2000x faster)
